Business

Farming

  • Income Tax

    Income Tax is a tax on income - find out about what it is, tax codes, how you pay and how to check you're paying the right amount

  • Calculate vehicle tax rates

    Use the online tool to find the tax rate for all vehicle types

  • Apply for a tax disc refund (form V14)

    Fill in form V14 and send to DVLA to apply for a vehicle tax disc refund

  • Get a tax disc (vehicle licence)

    Tax your vehicle online, by phone, post or at a Post Office - get your tax disc

  • Exchange a tax disc

    Apply at DVLA local offices or fill in form V70 ‘Application to exchange a vehicle tax disc’ and send to DVLA with any payment and extra documents

  • Vehicle tax rate tables

    Tables showing the rates for a tax disc (vehicle tax) for different types of vehicles
